content.text: Hey, I'm really interested in getting into dnd.
That's great! I love DnD. I'm currently in a campaign as a barbarian.
That sounds so fun! I've always wanted to play but I haven't found a group yet.
I'd be happy to invite you to my game if you'd like!
That would be awesome! I'm free on Sundays if you guys play then.
Perfect! We play every Sunday at 5pm.
That works great for me. I'll see you then!
Hey, I was wondering what kind of dice I need for DnD?
You need a set of polyhedral dice. They have d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, and d20.
Oh, okay. I'll go buy a set today.
Great! If you need any help learning how to play, I'm always happy to help.
